tha-ap24:5.1: Tathā → tattha (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1, mr) | bhūmi → nemi (bj); kācehi (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap24:9.1: sattahi ratnehi → sattaratanehi (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap24:11.1: assumha → assumhā (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1); āsimhā (?)
tha-ap24:16.2: akaruṁ te ca kañcukaṁ → akaruttarakañcukaṁ (bj); … akaruṁ tāva kañcukaṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed); … akaruttarakañcukaṁ (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap24:28.4: āloko hoti → ālokā honti (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr)
tha-ap24:35.4: kubbaṁ na tappare → kubbantanappakaṁ (bj); kubbanti tappare (pts-vp-pli1)
